workPlaces.name: Orange
workPlaces.title: Prior Experience
workPlaces.description:
Prior to software development I was the best tech support engineer you can find. I have worked in local ISP support center, soon to become a senior support engineer, then shift manager and evetually tech support team lead.
As a result I have a wide understanding of networking, routing and managment skills.

workPlaces.name: Niloosoft
workPlaces.title: Niloosoft
workPlaces.description: The journey begins! Specialized on .NET framework, microservices architechture and MSSQL on the back-end. Used AngularJS and Angular 2, JQuery, Material UI on the front-end. Developed event driven applications in the Human Resources wold.

workPlaces.name: Sagarmatha
workPlaces.title: Sagarmatha
workPlaces.description: I gladly took the opportunity to go all-in with JavaScript with an very interesting Big Data company! Node.js, express.js, Angular 2+, MongoDB and MSSQL. With this well established big-data company I was developing a coupons managment system for large retailers mainly in the U.S.

workPlaces.name: Aeronautics
workPlaces.title: Aeronautics
workPlaces.description: I took a chalange outside of web-development world with a defence contractor. Maintained an AngularJS generator application and took part in developing the company's next flight simulator.

workPlaces.title: Smoove
